title: Mein Kliniken Schmieder
description:
Use your therapist's knowledge at home:

• An individual training plan that is available at all times and individually customized to your personal goals and needs
• In-depth knowledge on medical conditions, relaxation techniques and nutritional tips for a more effective therapy
• Intensive support, even after your stay with us
• Use the app to become more independent each day

User-friendly training videos:
• The Mein Schmieder app is very easy to use. All training videos contain sequences that show you the correct execution of your exercises enabling you to train as well on your own as with your therapist!

Rate your exercises and monitor your progress:
• Use the app to rate your exercises and monitor your individual progress. Additionally, you can keep in touch with your therapist via video call and discuss your results. Connect your fitness wearables or smartwatch to the Mein Schmieder app and stay informed on your activity goals.


Get more in-depth therapy:
• The Mein Schmieder app allows you to exercise correctly and always at the right intensity. This ensures the effectiveness of your therapy and leads to significant, long-term improvements of your condition.

We value your feedback! If you have any questions regarding your training plan or your exercises, please message your therapist via the app. In case of technical support or suggestions for improvement, please contact our technology partner CASPAR Health.
